editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as ever‚Äîand you won‚Äôt believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.

ios.subtitle: Build your vehicle for a race

name: Need for Speed No Limits Game

editorialNotes.standard: A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.

name: Bike 3XM
artistName: Abc Vietnam telecommunication services company limited

editorialNotes.standard: Noodlecake Studios hits a hole in one with this great twist on one of our favourite golf games. Playing Super Stickman Golf 3‚Äôs wacky courses with Flappy Bird‚Äìstyle mechanics turns the challenge into a moment-by-moment struggle. Every flap counts, and when you time them just right‚Äîor reach the hole first in race mode‚Äîit‚Äôs exhilarating.
Infiltrating zombie-infested warehouses might not be the easiest way to fix up a taco truck, but it‚Äôs definitely the most entertaining.
